Posts.EditableText: I want player to only be able to take a certain object if they have a certain object in their inventory, is it possible to add conditional to 'take'?
Posts.HTML: I want player to only be able to take a certain object if they have a certain object in their inventory, is it possible to add conditional to 'take'?

Posts.EditableText: Yes. On the Inventory tab you can set the object to use a script instead of the default. Do it all there.
Posts.HTML: Yes. On the Inventory tab you can set the object to use a script instead of the default. Do it all there.

Posts.EditableText: Ah! Thanks, should have spotted that! Have been making my first ever game for last two weeks, and this forum has been so helpful!
Posts.HTML: Ah! Thanks, should have spotted that! Have been making my first ever game for last two weeks, and this forum has been so helpful!
